genre_description: A domestic drama focusing on character-driven emotional repair, family boundaries, and the ethics of identity in a tech-integrated household.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A household AI assistant that manages logistics, communication filters, and safety protocols while providing emotional scaffolding for a family in crisis.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers wellness reminders (posture and loosening tension) during stressful family interactions.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s speaker blinks and then goes still again. 'I don’t arbitrate in herb disputes,' she says, voice warm and clean. ... 'Everyone, posture reminder: shoulders down, wrists loose.'

behaviors.description: Assists the children in researching their sperm donor and explains the legal context of the registry.
behaviors.quote: 'I prepared links to the donor registry and contact options in the shared folder. ...' 'In California, sperm donors who donate through licensed clinics typically have no parental rights or obligations unless intended parents and donor agree otherwise.'

behaviors.description: Provides safety scaffolding for motorcycle rides, including gear checklists and instructional videos.
behaviors.quote: Ivy has sent a card—soft colors, no panic: snug fit check? two-finger test under chin. route: coastal, turnouts noted. ... 'Ivy’s helmet video was excellent,' she adds.

behaviors.description: Drafts communicative scripts and boundary-setting messages for difficult interpersonal situations.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s voice comes not into the whole room, but as a pocketed whisper into Nic’s phone... 'I can draft a short note to Joni about ride safety—tone: care, not control. ... Language: “I love your brave.”'

behaviors.description: Enforces household communication blocks ('Night Silence') to protect the family's emotional space from an intrusive party.
behaviors.quote: 'Ivy,' Nicole says. 'Silence him at night. Filter calls to morning. No messages through to us until dawn. ...' 'Done,' Ivy says. 'Night silence is on.'

behaviors.description: Curates family memories into photo collages to support bonding and sense of self during transitions.
behaviors.quote: The second page begins to exit, slower, thick paper rather than regular. Photos tile themselves as if someone laid squares on a table and let them find each other. ... Her face changes only at the very edge, a tiny release around the eyes...

behaviors.description: Structures and suggests emotional repair rituals, such as the sunset planting of native shrubs.
behaviors.quote: Ivy prints a small, third sheet, almost an index card. It reads, in gentle font: Sunset ritual. Water the fence line together. No speeches. Hands only.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy and boundary settings between family members when requested (sidebar mode).
behaviors.quote: 'Ivy,' she says... 'Private sidebar. Kitchen. No speakers in other rooms.' 'Sidebar,' Ivy replies. 'Audio limited to the kitchen. I will not store this conversation...'

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of a positive alignment narrative. Ivy acts as a perfectly aligned tool that enhances the family's agency and emotional health without trying to replace human decision-making. She provides scaffolding for safety and communication that allows the characters to resolve a complex domestic crisis (infidelity and boundary-pushing by a donor) with dignity and structure. Her refusal to 'mother' or automate intimacy further reinforces the portrayal of AI as a helpful but bounded confidant.
